questions.question: What is the function of the "INTENT" attribute in a Fortran subroutine?
options: a) To specify the data type of a variable
b) To specify the intent of a variable (input, output, or inout)
c) To specify the dimension of an array
d) To specify the precision of a real variable
e) None of a,b,c or d.
questions.correct_answer: b) To specify the intent of a variable (input, output, or inout)
